offense_description: Unexcused tardiness/absence from class
Wearing inappropriate/incomplete uniform (No validated ID, flat shoes, colored pants, colored t-shirt, no/old socks)
Wearing of improper and other colored PE uniforms
Wearing of ripped/distressed jeans, crop top, sleeveless, backless, off-shoulder, see-through blouses, spaghetti strap, tube top, body cone, mini skirt, open toe shoes
Wearing of accessories not part of the daily uniform (e.g. multiple pairs of earrings for females)
Wearing of heavy make-up or cosmetics (dark mascara, eyeliner, lipsticks, eye shadows, facial make-up)
Wearing of scarves, patches, caps
Wearing and using of electronic headset and/or audio/electronic gadgets and tools during class without teacher's permission
Wearing of school uniform/program uniform improperly (e.g. club shirt, outing, internet places)
Colored nail polish
Colored dyed color/hair/beard
Not following prescribed hair cut (trendy/punk haircut, long hair and bearded, mohawk, top knot, skinhead)
Not attending school function/activities (Mass/Novena, Program/Forum, Seminar/Symposium, GE/SG, ALC)
Shouting, yelling boisterously, jeering, dropping insults and other noises during class sessions, corridors, guidance and public places
Littering the campus (candy wrappers, bottles, plastic materials)
Placing of stickers and other objects on school ID
Posing of bikini pictures or other videos/body exposure pictures or indecent body pictures
Public display of affection in any places inside the campus or in social media
Indecency in media
Use of foul language
A student caught lending, borrowing, using another person’s ID/SSP
Bullying (Cyber or otherwise) Faculty members/personnel
Students/fellow students - Verbally/Written
Students/fellow students - Physically
Assault fellow students
Verbal or physical altercation between students or group of students
Purchase, sale or distribution of alcoholic beverages or cigarettes
Posting below or circulating destructive language or signs in the internet or through multimedia
Unbecoming attitude of an image as Pitikarts such as gossiping in multi-media to endanger others
Altering information (e.g., changing the password of someone else's account and accessed data/files beyond authorization)
Bringing outsiders to school during school function/activity
Bringing outsiders to school for improper purpose
Circulating destructive language and statement that is against the school through any platform
Cheating in examinations, projects, case reports and research papers of others
Cybersecurity breach (plagiarism)
Gaining access to the school computer or computer network
Damage, destruction of network, computer or information (e.g., deleting someone else's file)
Display, possession or distribution of pornographic materials, downloading and uploading of pornographic pictures
Engaging in any form of gambling
Falsification of official documents, test papers, clearances and confidential
Forgery
Inciting others to violate school regulations or not to attend classes
Introducing false information, accessing someone else’s account and sending offensive email, etc.
Jumping over the fence
Leaving the classroom without permission during class hour and school activity
Lending/borrowing school ID as pass/for gate access
Unauthorized use of information
Preventing normal operation (e.g. changing the configuration or BIOS setup of computers)
Introduction of improper, foul or indecent language or gesture
Shoplifting
Smoking, vaping or possession of cigarettes, drinking hard drinks or liquor in and outside the school campus
Stealing property of the school, students, school personnel, and fellow students
Unauthorized enrichment or stealing whether attempted, frustrated, or consummated
Vandalism, destruction of school properties
Viewing pornographic sites on the Internet/websites in the Computer Laboratory
Wearing of plunging necklines, backless, spaghetti straps, indecent attire
Wilful and malicious damage of the property of any member of school community
Wilful failure to comply with promises or notices issued for purposes of investigation in connection with conducted trial of offense
Engaging in trouble outside the campus endangering the name of school
Forging signatures of school authorities, parents, guardians or students
Gambling/betting in all forms
Bringing dishonor to the name of school
Gross acts of disobedience, disrespect in words and in deeds which tend to put the school or any member of the administration, faculty, staff and maintenance or students in ridicule or contempt
Extortion or blackmailing or attempt
Insubordination to authorities, supervisors, and personnel, faculty members verbally, in writing, physically and slander/oral defamation
Lack of respect to faculty/authority
Organizing of groups for purpose of destroying school properties
Real acts of threat (major/minor) that constitute incompatibility
Engaging in premarital sex
Engaging outside marriage, obscene and immoral conduct in and off campus
Providing/financing parties for prohibited drugs
Promoting or participating in immoral/indecent conduct on or off campus
Recruitment and/or membership in sororities and fraternities
Pushing of prohibited drugs
Conviction for a criminal offense by the administrator's judgment
Direct assault on the person or any member of the administration, faculty, staff, and/or any person vested with authority
Membership in sororities and fraternities
Possession or use of deadly weapons, explosives, prohibited drugs
Grave threat on any student, personnel or administrator
Using another person's identity
Consistent violation of school rules and regulations
